body_html: I suspect you are right, the reduce_prod is not used very often and certainly not often on the gpu. To successfully solve your problem, you'd need to make sure all ops used to implement reduce_prod had gpu implementations. We are likely not going to do this soon (@zheng-xq might know more). Eventually, things like XLA should help allow more complete gpu implementation. Good luck!

body: I suspect you are right, the reduce_prod is not used very often and certainly not often on the gpu. To successfully solve your problem, you'd need to make sure all ops used to implement reduce_prod had gpu implementations. We are likely not going to do this soon (@zheng-xq  might know more). Eventually, things like XLA should help allow more complete gpu implementation. Good luck!
